summary: The module defines a dataset class for loading pet images with labels, applies standard image transformations, and includes a command‑line interface that builds a timm model, configures an optimizer and OneCycle learning‑rate scheduler, and runs a training loop using the Accelerate library for distributed or mixed‑precision training.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑run example demonstrating how to set up and train a deep learning model for pet image classification, serving as a reference for computer‑vision pipelines and model development workflows.
